column2: Splitting and Coupling of Units: Permitted in all platforms
Platform Reoccupation Time(After terminating service onDown Main)
column3: The next Down train cannot depart Foxfield until the terminating train hasshunted to the Up Main and is then clear of the Down Main.The minimum allowance for this is 8 minutes after the terminating train’sarrival. However, the terminating train cannot reoccupy the Up Main until 3minutes after the departure of any proceeding Up train from Millom.
